name: Asteroid Shooter (Mr. Khristar)
description:
Here it is another style of game I created to practice. This time is based on the classic game Space Invaders, hope you like it!
This game was created using Java language in Eclipse IDE. If you want to suggest ideas of simple games, feel free to write anything in comments :D
I've made another game before this one, a pong one. Try it out!
